module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param:
Simple text search of all FileTrek audit events
Use '*' as wildcard
For more search options use the Splunk 'Search' app. and enter 'index==ftauditevents' as the first search clause

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: index="ftauditevent*" $SearchString$ | eval Id=coalesce(ftstartfileid,ftfileid) | eval File=coalesce(ftstartfileidpath,ftfileidpath) | eval Volume=coalesce(ftstartfileidvolumeidname, ftfileidvolumeidname, ftstartfileidvolume, ftfileidvolume) | eval EndFile=coalesce(ftendfileidpath, '') | eval EndVolume=coalesce(ftendfileidvolumeidname, ftendfileidvolume, '') | eval Action=coalesce(ftlinktype,fteventtype, '') | rename ftendfileid as EndFileId ftsourceuseridname as User ftsourceuserid as UserId ftsourcemachineidname as Machine ftsourcemachineid as MachineId fteventtime as Date | fields Id, File, Volume, Action, EndFileId, EndFile, EndVolume, UserId, User, MachineId, Machine, Date | fields - _* | dedup Id
